title: Trump to attend Charlie Kirk memorial. Here's what to know.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to appear at the Charlie Kirk memorial in Arizona on Sept. 21. Here's what to know.

title: Trump wants to designate antifa as a terrorist group. What is it?
shortDescription: Experts question how Trump will accomplish this, saying antifa is more of a concept than an organization with a headquarters and leadership structure.

title: Why First Amendment advocates worry after ABC yanked Kimmel's show
shortDescription: Free speech advocates worry about an environment increasingly seen as not healthly for the First Amendment.

title: Whistleblower offers look inside one of America's deadliest jails
shortDescription: A former captain under Riverside County Sheriff Chad Bianco alleges cover-ups and retaliation in a lawsuit and exclusive interview.

title: Trump renews calls to punish critics: 'They’re not allowed to do that'
shortDescription: Trump discussed probing protesters and potentially withholding broadcast licenses from critics while returning from a state visit abroad.

title: Obama calls out Trump handling of Kimmel
shortDescription: Former President Obama is urging media companies to stand up to Trump after Jimmy Kimmel's talk show suspension in wake of Charlie Kirk's death.

title: Trump suggests FCC consider anti-Trump bias
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters that networks airing negative coverage of him should risk losing FCC licenses.

title: Obama urges media companies to stand up to Trump, resist 'coercion'
shortDescription: Former President Obama urges media companies to stand up to Trump after Jimmy Kimmel's talk show suspension in wake of Charlie Kirk's death.

title: Trump floats revoking TV licenses over negative coverage of him
shortDescription: President Trump said overwhelming negative coverage about him by TV networks should be grounds for the FCC to revoke their broadcast licenses.

title: Federal judge bars Trump from deporting Guatemalan children
shortDescription: A U.S. District judge ordered the Trump administration to refrain from deporting hundreds of unaccompanied migrant children to Guatemala.

title: DC leaders tell Congress that National Guard isn't helping with crime
shortDescription: "My understanding is many of them were looking kind of bored with what they were doing," said City Council Chair Phil Mendelson.

title: Trump wants Afghanistan air base back in U.S. hands
shortDescription: The U.S. left Bagram air base in 2021 ahead of its chaotic withdrawal from Afghanistan and the subsequent Taliban takeover.

title: Trump says US trying to get Bagram air base back
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the U.S is trying to get the Bagram air base back in Afghanistan.

title: Trump targets antifa movement as 'terrorist organization'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signaled new action against left-wing groups, targeting the anti-fascist antifa movement as a "terrorist organization."

title: Melania Trump's yellow dress, other UK fashion picks: What to know
shortDescription: The former model’s sartorial choices are endlessly dissected – as they have been of most first ladies.

title: Did Trump solve 7 wars? Here is what wars he is referring to
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Keir Starmer spoke at a press conference in the UK on Sept. 18. Trump says he solved seven wars, is it true?

title: Trump talks Gaza, TikTok and immigration
shortDescription: Trump ends UK visit with remarks on Gaza, TikTok, Putin and immigration, urging Starmer to adopt his border policies.

title: Trump addresses free speech, Jimmy Kimmel
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was asked about free speech and Jimmy Kimmel's firing during a press conference in the U.K.
